panels.description:
This value should decrease as backup actions 


are completed to a minimum of ~3 lines (because of the header comments) and then reset to the maximum when a new plan is made.

panels.description: Note that this is not *actual* upload speed. Currently it is the total size of the files processed.

alert.message:
Puppetserver "error" or "warning" count above threshold. 
Please check server log and consider fixing errors caused from recent (yesterday-ish) changes to the puppet configuration.
alert.name: Puppetmaster log events alert
